name: ELayer
overview:
ELayer is a division of InfoGenius, Inc. headquartered in Allentown, Pennsylvania of the United States. InfoGenius has been providing businesses worldwide with the internet technology they need to successfully build, manage, and grow robust e-Businesses since 1999. ELayer continues this tradition by providing businesses with leading edge website monitoring solutions that help them deliver a first-class user experience online. ELayer has drawn on InfoGeniusâ€™ extensive history and experience in the Website Monitoring market through its popular AlertBot product-line to create next generation website monitoring solutions that redefines the industry. With advances such as ELayerâ€™s RealBrowserTM Technology and its Real-time Transaction Engine, ELayer is able to deliver a level of testing accuracy and realism unsurpassed in the industry.

ELayer is proud to service many of the worldâ€™s leading online business, including many of the top Fortune 500 companies. Businesses choose ELayer for its uncompromising quality, one-on-one customer care, and leading edge solutions.
